DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate plasma alcohol concentration in patients receiving Paclitaxel or Docetaxel infusion.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Plasma Alcohol Concentration in Patients Receiving Paclitaxel or Docetaxel
DOC.detailed_description: In this study, there is no experimental treatment, or experimental care.
DOC.criteria: Chemotherapy with docetaxel or paclitaxel on an every 3week schedule. Patient with bitherapy are eligible only if the taxane is the first infusion. All type of tumor. Age>18 years old. Signed written informed consent. Patient under 18. Patient with bitherapy, if docetaxel or paclitaxel is not administered first. Patient deprived of liberty.
DOC.keyword: Patients receiving docetaxel or paclitaxel. All tumors.
